resources.string: These are the developers behind the design, coding, and mechanics that bring this game to life. From crafting smooth gameplay to solving complex challenges.
Driven by creativity and a shared vision, evolving their ideas and skills to bring their game to life from concept to completion.
Demonstrated creativity, overcoming challenges and boundaries to deliver a memorable gaming experience.
Already have an account? Log in
Match all the blocks with the same drawings before the time runs out!
1. Find a Match:\n\t\t\tTap or click two blocks with the same drawing to match them.
2. Clear the Board:\n\t\t\tMatch all blocks to win the game! You must clear all blocks within the time limit.

3. Score Multiplier:
			Matching blocks correctly one after another without mistakes will activate a score multiplier. The more consecutive correct matches you make, the higher your score multiplier goes!

 A wrong match resets the multiplier back to 1Ã—.
4. Time is Ticking:\n\t\t\tKeep an eye on the timer! If it runs out before you match all the blocks, the game is over.
